changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE cpr_zoop_raw_flat ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, "Route" text, start_port text, end_port text, route_frequency text, route_start_date text, vessel_name text, trip_code text, "Longitude" double precision NOT NULL, "Latitude" double precision NOT NULL, "SampleDateUTC" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, taxon_name text, family text, genus text, species text, sex text, life_stage text, taxon_group text, taxon_eco_group text, aphiaid bigint, taxon_start_date text, taxon_per_m3 real, zoop_comments text, acknowledgements text, geom geometry(Geometry,4326) CHECK (st_isvalid(geom)) );
CREATE INDEX cpr_zoop_raw_flat_gist_idx ON cpr_zoop_raw_flat USING GIST (geom);

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE cpr_zoop_taxon_changelog ( taxon_name text PRIMARY KEY, taxon_start_date text, first_occurrence text, parent_taxon_name text, training text, comments text );

changeSet.author: talend
talend
talend
talend
talend
talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS cpr_zoop_raw_flat_map CASCADE; CREATE VIEW cpr_zoop_raw_flat_map AS SELECT r.id, r."Route", r.start_port, r.end_port, r.route_frequency, r.route_start_date, r.vessel_name, r.trip_code, r."Longitude", r."Latitude", r."SampleDateUTC", to_char(r."SampleDateUTC", 'YYYY') AS "Year", to_char(r."SampleDateUTC", 'MM') AS "Month", to_char(r."SampleDateUTC", 'DD') AS "Day", to_char(r."SampleDateUTC", 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time_24hr", r.taxon_name, r.family, r.genus, r.species, r.sex, r.life_stage, r.taxon_group, r.taxon_eco_group, r.aphiaid, r.taxon_start_date, r.taxon_per_m3, r.zoop_comments, r.acknowledgements, c.first_occurrence, c.parent_taxon_name, c.training, c.comments, r.geom FROM cpr_zoop_raw_flat r LEFT JOIN cpr_zoop_taxon_changelog c USING (taxon_name, taxon_start_date) ;
